description: President Macron's crackdown on Islamists causes political waves at home and abroad.
title: France targets radical Islamism amid Turkey row
title_page: France targets radical Islamism amid Turkey row - BBC News
maintext: "Macron is adding fuel to the fire," Mr Mucchielli said. "He doesn't want to appear on the back foot, compared to the right and the far right. His main goal is to get re-elected in 2022, [so] he needs to occupy the ground of the far right. And their themes, since the end of the 19th Century, have been immigration and security."
